message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice, considering the risk of inflation. Please let me know if you agree.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, considering the inflation will be more detrimental to you than to me. This is a fair compromise to avoid further losses.
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal division of the $10000. This ensures that both of us face the same level of risk and benefit equally from the division.
